testcase.name: delete - if the delete of a subject is requested, it must be performed()
login - when a subject is logging in and their password matches, true must be returned()
login - when a subject is logging in and their password does not match, false must be returned()
assignGroupToSubject - if a group is to be assigned to the subject, the subject has to be persisted with the newly assigned group()
register - when a subject is registered, their password must be encoded()
getSubject - if a specific subject is requested by its username, it must be returned()
listAllSubjects - if a list of all subjects is requested but it's empty, the empty result must be returned()
listAllSubjects - if a list of all subjects is requested, it must be returned()
getSubject - if a specific subject is requested by its id, it must be returned()
